Song.title: The Lord's Prayer
Song.copyright: Matt Shepardson Copyright 1999 Ever Devoted Music

Arrangement.description: Bloom arrangement with "Praise the Lord" & "Greater than We Can Imagine"
Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [A]Fat[D]her in [A]heav[D]en, [A]all p[D]raise be to your n[A]ame [D] [A]Fat[D]her in [A]heav[D]en, [A]all p[D]raise be to your n[A]ame [D] [D2]Your kingdom [A]come, [D2]your will be [A]done On the [F#M7]earth as it is in [E]he[ESUS]aven[E]
CHORUS: Yours is the [A2]kingdom, Yours is the [D]power Yours is the [A]glory, forever and [E]ever Yours is the [A2]kingdom, Yours is the [D]power Yours is the [A2]glory forever and [E]eve[ESUS]r
{key:A} VERSE 2: [A]Fat[D]her in [A]heav[D]en, [A]all p[D]raise be to your n[A]ame [D] [A]Fat[D]her in [A]heav[D]en, [A]all p[D]raise be to your n[A]ame [D] [D2]Give us to[A]day, [D2]our daily b[A]read And for[F#M7]give us, Lord as we for[E]giv[ESUS]e [E]
BRIDGE: [C#M7]Lead us [D2]not into tempt[A2]ation But from [F#M7]evil, Lord set us [E]fre[ESUS]e [E]
Chorus 2: [A]Everything that [D/A]has breath, praise the [A]Lord Everything thatâ€™s [D/A]in us, praise Him [A/C#]Everything that [D]has breath, praise the [Bm]Lord [| F#m]
CHORUS 3: Because You are g[D]reater{,} than we can im[A]agine [| A] You are too be[D]autiful for us to f[A]athom [| A] Oh, You are g[F#m]reat and g[E]reatly to be p[D]raised [| D]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 father in heaven all praise be to your name father in heaven all praise be to your name your kingdom come your will be done on the earth as it is in heaven chorus yours is the kingdom yours is the power yours is the glory forever and ever yours is the kingdom yours is the power yours is the glory forever and ever verse 2 father in heaven all praise be to your name father in heaven all praise be to your name give us today our daily bread and forgive us lord as we forgive bridge lead us not into temptation but from evil lord set us free chorus 2 everything that has breath praise the lord everything thats in us praise him everything that has breath praise the lord chorus 3 because you are greater than we can imagine you are too beautiful for us to fathom oh you are great and greatly to be praised
